roleset.name: located 'around', in the general vicinity

example.name: about-j: arg1
example.text: Mr. Kelly has recovered from surgery without any complication and is up and about and asymptomatic .

roleset.note: ABOUT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from about.01-j)

roleset.name: about to __

example.name: about: modal-ish
example.text: John was about to start jumping up and down.

roleset.note: ABOUT-J NOTES: Added by Julia and Katie to accommodate quasi-adverbial/modal/future usage. Comparison to 'going to__', which is go.04. (from about.02-j)
This roleset has no roles, so don't tag any!
